entry.data:
SUNNY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 18
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON

CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS

MOSTLY CLOUDY

PARTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
